sql.S: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS public.orders; CREATE TABLE public.orders (order_id INTEGER, customer_id INTEGER, order_date DATE, total_amount DECIMAL(10,2)); COPY public.orders FROM 's3://my-redshift-data/orders/' IAM_ROLE 'arn:aws:iam::123456789012:role/MyRedshiftRole' FORMAT AS CSV IGNOREHEADER 1 DELIMITER ',';
